class.name: ITChannelID
class.author: Matthew Needham
class.desc: ITChannelID is a class that describes a single channel of LHCb Inner tracker.
* Now, only the station, layer, wafer and strip number can be retrieved. * All numbers start from 1.

constructor.argList: unsigned int station, unsigned int layer, unsigned int wafer, unsigned int strip
constructor.desc: constructor with station, layer, wafer, strip
constructor.code: m_channelID = (((unsigned long)(station-1) << stationBits) & stationMask) | (((unsigned long)(layer-1) << layerBits) & layerMask) | (((unsigned long)(wafer-1) << waferBits) & waferMask) | (((unsigned long)(strip-1) << stripBits) & stripMask );

method.name: setStrip
method.code: m_channelID &= stationMask | layerMask | waferMask; m_channelID |= ((unsigned long)(strip-1) << stripBits) & stripMask;

enum.desc: Enumeration to store the bit packing offsets
enum.name: bits

enum.desc: Enumeration to store the bit packing masks
enum.name: masks
